item.description: SoulCollage® Come for an afternoon of creativity for your soul.  Hundreds of images are provided for you to create you own "deck" of cards using glue and 5x8 mat board.  Express your passions, your inner "personalities", your shadow sides, the stuff of life you love!  Honor your transitions, desires, anything! A journaling process provides a way to deepen the meaning of your cards. We also use the cards for "divination"... asking a question and selecting a card from someone else's upside-down deck. There is always an answer in the card! Held in a sunlit sactuary with soft music.  Very relaxing.  Express your Soul!  All materials supplied, including my huge stash of amazing images.  The event runs 1-4 pm.  See samples  of Judy's cards.  Also see more offerings at www.AHigherBalance.com
item.why: SoulCollage is a fun and easy process to create your own "deck" of cards with hundreds of images supllied. Create cards to use as inspiration or divination. Express your desires, transitions, aspects of your personality, anything!
item.name: SoulCollage
